attributes.action: Plz can we learn from remote learning
attributes.additional_details: It will reduce emission from cars and students won’t have an excuse to be late
attributes.background: I want us students to do remote learning on zoom

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's not clear if you want all schools to be closed, and replaced with online learning, or for students to be given the choice of whether to attend school, or learn online.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
